title: Interactive Map Explorer Demo
description: A demonstration of the Interactive Map Explorer platform, showcasing its key features and analytical capabilities.

highlights.title: Interface Overview
highlights.description: Introduction to the map interface and key navigation controls

highlights.title: Data Layers
highlights.description: How to add, customize, and toggle different data layers

highlights.title: Spatial Analysis Tools
highlights.description: Demonstration of buffer, isochrone, and spatial join capabilities

highlights.title: Temporal Visualization
highlights.description: Animating data changes over time with temporal controls

highlights.title: Data Export & Sharing
highlights.description: Options for exporting analysis results and sharing interactive maps
